```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(tictoc)
library(zazou)
set.seed(42)
```


```{r data}
attach(alcohol)
```

# Abundance 

```{r}
dim(X)
```


# z-scores

```{r zscores}
pval_obs <- test_wilcoxon(X, Y)$p.value
zsco_obs <- p2z(pval_obs)
```

# Tree

```{r tree}
tree <- force_ultrametric(tree)
N_branch <- length(tree$edge.length)
plot_shifts(tree, NA, obs_scores = zsco_obs)
```

# Shift estimation

## L-BFGS-B


```{r lbfgsb}
tic()
est_lbfgsb <- estimate_shifts2(Delta0 = rep(0, N_branch), zscores = zsco_obs,
                               lambda = 0.1, tree = tree, alpha = 1,
                               method = "L-BFGS-B")
toc()
est_lbfgsb
plot(est_lbfgsb)
```

## Shooting 


```{r shooting01}
set.seed(42)
tic()
est_shooting01 <- estimate_shifts2(Delta0 = rep(0, N_branch), zscores = zsco_obs,
                                   lambda = 0.1, tree = tree, alpha = 0.1,
                                   method = "shooting2")
toc()
est_shooting01
plot(est_shooting01)
```

```{r shooting03}
set.seed(42)
tic()
est_shooting03 <- estimate_shifts2(Delta0 = rep(0, N_branch), zscores = zsco_obs,
                                   lambda = 0.1, tree = tree, alpha = 0.1,
                                   method = "shooting3")
toc()
est_shooting03
plot(est_shooting03)
```



```{r}
est_lbfgsb$objective_value
```
